00009 void pushLocalScope(MavenCompiler* c, MavenVariable var) {
00010         // safety (this should never occur)
00011         if(c->localScope.size() == 0) return;
00012         
00013         c->localScope[c->localScope.size() - 1].push(var);
00014 }
